metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5826 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Use after free in IndexedDB in Google Chrome prior to 73.0.3683.86 alloweda remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentiallyexploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5826` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
